markdownPage.header_excerpt: Our open-source lightweight OS and autonomous technology powers the decentralization of the Internet with more Security, Privacy & Performance-Efficiency.

slides.title: Security
slides.content: Own gateway, dispersed algorythm, smart contract for IT, no login shell, no API.

cards.title: We started everything from scratch...

cards.excerpt: By starting again from zero, we created a unique lightweight and autonomous OS built from a Linux Kernel. From there, we developed a fully automous system with its own network connection overlay, unique storage algorythm, and storage system that alltogether (1) eliminate backdoors for hackers, (2) eliminate complexity from the model (3) ensure data is fully secured and encrypted.

cta.title: The largest peer-to-peer Internet Grid is Live
cta.excerpt: The ThreeFold Grid is live with 80+ PB and 500 Nodes deployed across 23+ countries, and growing fast.
